title: Publish PATIL Construction website (frontend build/deploy readiness)

requirements.summary: Ensure the current PATIL Construction site builds cleanly and all referenced static assets resolve in production.
acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment is completed successfully for the current codebase.
The build completes with no TypeScript compilation errors.
All referenced static assets resolve at runtime (no 404s for /assets/generated/*).
The deployed site loads and renders the main sections (Header, Hero, Services, About, Contact, Footer) without runtime errors.

file_operations.description: Update the header logo image reference to use a stable generated asset path (served from the public assets folder) so production builds don’t fail or 404 due to missing/space-containing filenames. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Update the footer logo image reference to use the same stable generated asset path as the header to prevent runtime 404s in production. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add the generated hero image as a static public asset at this exact path so the Hero section’s /assets/generated/* reference resolves in production (copy from the provided asset: generated/patil-hero.dim_1920x800.png).
Add the generated logo image as a static public asset at this exact path so Header/Footer logo references resolve in production (copy from the provided asset: generated/patil-logo.dim_512x512.png).
